meanings.definition: The quality of being tough or sinewy, especially in meat.
meanings.sent1: The gristliness of the steak made it hard to chew.
meanings.sent2: The gristliness of the jerky gave it a satisfying texture.
meanings.sent3: The gristliness of the chicken made it a challenge for the hungry dog.
meanings.sent4: The gristliness of the roast beef was like trying to cut through leather.
meanings.sent5: The gristliness of the pork was so tough, it felt like biting into a rubber band.
